title: Shamanism: A Miscellany
description:
Shamanism: A Miscellany
15 PDFs

This is an assortment of little pieces (mainly articles from scholarly journals) on the subject of shamanism. I've converted them all to PDFs. Some of the links in the texts work; some do not.

Brazil - Juruna Shamanism
Female Shamanism in Japan
Hunza Shamanism
Korean Shamanistic Performance
Kuznetsova on Shamanism
Living Landscape of Knowledge
Nordic Shamanism
Shaman as the Zoomorphic Human
Shamanism and Medicine in Nepal
Shamanism and Rock Art
Shamanism and Art in the Himalayas
Shamanism in Afghanistan
Shamanism in Bangladesh
Shamanism in Nepal
Shamanism in the Rig Vedas

A search on shamanism at archive.org returns over fifty items: <a href="
http://www.archive.org/search.php?query=shamanism" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.archive.org/search.php?query=shamanism</a>

At the Internet Sacred Text Archive (sacred-texts.com), there are seven items:
 <a href=" http://www.sacred-texts.com/sha/index.htm" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.sacred-texts.com/sha/index.htm</a>
Of course, it should be remembered that in general, shamanism is a pre-literary experience. In fact, there is a saying that as the books come in, the drums (used by the shamans) go out. I will soon be uploading some audios that emphasize experiencing shamanism yourself.

Check my torrents for reference works on shamanism and other topics, and, of course, please seed!
